title: The Vagabond: Origins
description: Have you ever thought you were capable of doing more with your life? And then someone confused you for a superhero? Batman meets A Beautiful Mind in this action packed tale of a wealthy comic book creator driven to madness by a conniving gold-digger, believing that one of his characters, The Vagabond, is the only one who can put his world straight.  An underground homeless community convinces runaway Vinnie Darusa of his destiny as the leather clad superhero, only to find that his heart and spirit are strong enough to bring reality to the mysterious Vagabond.
author: Hyphen D.
